decision_text:
Patient: age 21, primary: Injury to thoracic aorta.
Actionable summary:
- Proceed with emergent contrast-enhanced CT/CTA immediately.
- Notify radiology and document renal function and contrast volume.
- Document discussion of renal risk and obtain consent when practicable; monitor creatinine post-contrast if indicated.
rationale: Life/organ-threatening diagnosis; imaging benefit may outweigh renal risk.
